TEXT.TITLE: COMPUTER <CPTLA.O> FOUNDER RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Computer Telephone Corp said Stephen Ide, its founder and president, resigned for personal reasons, but will remain a consultant with the company. It said James Mahon, executive vice president, has been elected president effective immediately. Reuter
